#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <memory.h>


using namespace std;

#define ll long long int
#define inchar getchar_unlocked

 
inline void inp( ll &n )
{
n=0;
ll ch=inchar();ll sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=inchar();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=inchar();
n=n*sign;
}


ll kid[105],pencil[105];

inline ll absolute(ll x)
 {
     if(x<0) x = -x;
     return x;
 }

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	

	
	ll test;
	inp(test);
	int num = 0;
	while(test--)
	 {
	     ll n;
	     num++;
	     inp(n);
	     for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	      inp(kid[i]);
	     for(int i=0;i<n;i++) 
	      inp(pencil[i]);
	      
	     sort(kid,kid+n); 
	     sort(pencil,pencil+n);
	     
	     ll ans = 0;
	     for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	      ans += absolute(pencil[i]-kid[i]);
	     
	     printf("Case %d: %lld\n",num,ans);
	     
	 }
	
	return 0;
}
